name: Takeover: Ladder Climbing Tactics
description:
Takeover is a tactical ladder climber that always gives you an out. You play as a syndicate manager vying for control of the last publicly traded city. To beat your rivals, you’ll need tactics, strategy, and a dash of luck. Unlike most ladder climbers, you’re not limited to just playing with the cards in your hand and there is no pass. Instead you’ll:

-Pressure rivals with powerful formations
-Take, swap, or play cards from a shared market
-Use game-altering powers to gain the upper hand

Be the first to play out all your freelancers and The City is yours.

—description from the publisher
